message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.CY 

This paper discusses the development of a blockchain-based platform for resource allocation in Smart and Connected Communities (SCC), which involves the exchange of data and resources among stakeholders. This topic falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) as it deals with issues of integrity and trust in the exchange of resources. Additionally, the paper discusses the use of data sciences and optimization computation, which falls under the categories of distributed computing (cs.DC), social and information networks (cs.SI), and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). Finally, the paper also discusses the use of blockchain technology, which falls under the category of cryptography and security (cs.CY).
